Package edu.ou.cs2334.project5.Presenters

Class NonogramPresenter

java.lang.Object
edu.ou.cs2334.project5.Presenters.NonogramPresenter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Openable
public class NonogramPresenter extends Object implements Openable
This class implements the interface Openable to create a NonogramPresenter. NonogramPresenter combines components from NonogramModel and NonogramView to make a visual and functional Nonogram.
Author:
Natalie Hill
